svg.title: Tailspin Toys – Premium Enhanced Hero
svg.desc: A premium dark-mode hero interface with advanced gradients, interactive game cards, sophisticated typography, and modern visual effects.

g.text: Discover, back, and play the next generation of developer-themed games!
